00007 #include <cc-rs.h>

00009 // ##### utilitaires ##########################################################
00010 
00011 // ############################################################################
00012 // pour chacune des familles des chemins de type cc_reeds_shepp, deux
00013 // fonctions: la premiere (XXX_exists) verifie les conditions d'existence
00014 // d'un chemin de la famille consideree, la deuxieme (XXX_path) le calcule.
00015 // XXX_exists prend en entree deux cc-circles supposes decoules de la meme
00016 // paire (kappa, sigma).  XXX_path suppose les conditions d'existence
00017 // verifiees.
00018 
00019 
00020 // ##### TT ###################################################################
00021 bool TT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00022   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00023   if ( c1->left == c2->left ) { return false; }
00024   if ( c1->forward == c2->forward ) { return false; }
00025   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00026   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00027   if ( fabs (distance - 2 * c1->radius) > get_epsilon () ) { return false; }
00028   return true;
00029 }
00030 
00031 double TT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00032                 SMT_Configuration **q) {
00033   // calcul de la position intermediaire
00034   double x = (c1->xc + c2->xc) / 2;
00035   double y = (c1->yc + c2->yc) / 2;
00036   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00037   double angle = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00038   // calcul de l'orientation intermediaire
00039   double theta;
00040   if ( c1->left )
00041     if ( c1->forward ) { theta = angle + Half_Pi - c1->mu; }
00042     else { theta = angle + Half_Pi + c1->mu; }
00043   else 
00044     if ( c1->forward ) { theta = angle - Half_Pi + c1->mu; }
00045     else { theta = angle - Half_Pi - c1->mu; }
00046   // creation de la configuration intermediaire
00047   *q = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00048   // calcul de la longueur du chemin
00049   return rs_turn_length (c1, *q) + rs_turn_length (c2, *q);
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 // ##### TcT ##################################################################
00054 bool TcT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00055   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00056   if ( c1->left == c2->left ) { return false; }
00057   if ( c1->forward != c2->forward ) { return false; }
00058   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00059   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00060   if ( fabs (distance - 2 * c1->radius * cos (c1->mu)) > get_epsilon () ) 
00061     { return false; }
00062   return true;
00063 }
00064 
00065 double TcT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00066                  SMT_Configuration **q) {
00067   // distance des centres
00068   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00069   // parametres de position de la configuration intermediaire dans le
00070   // repere local au centre de c1
00071   double delta_x = 0.5 * distance;
00072   double delta_y = sqrt (fabs (pow (c1->radius, 2) - pow (delta_x, 2)));
00073   //
00074   double x, y, theta;
00075   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00076   double angle = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00077   // calcul de la configuration intermediaire
00078   if ( c1->left )
00079     if ( c1->forward ) { 
00080       theta = angle + Half_Pi; 
00081       global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, angle, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00082     }
00083     else { 
00084       theta = angle + Half_Pi; 
00085       global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, angle, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y); }
00086   else 
00087     if ( c1->forward ) { 
00088       theta = angle - Half_Pi;  
00089       global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, angle, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y); }
00090     else { 
00091       theta = angle - Half_Pi;  
00092       global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, angle, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y); }
00093 
00094   // creation de la configuration intermediaire
00095   *q = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00096   // calcul de la longueur du chemin
00097   return rs_turn_length (c1, *q) + rs_turn_length (c2, *q);
00098 }

00101 // ##### TST ##################################################################
00102 bool TiST_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00103   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00104   if ( c1->left == c2->left ) { return false; }
00105   if ( c1->forward == c2->forward ) { return false; }
00106   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00107   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00108   return ( distance >= 2 * c1->radius); 
00109 }   
00110     
00111 bool TeST_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00112   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00113   if ( c1->left != c2->left ) { return false; }
00114   if ( c1->forward == c2->forward ) { return false; }
00115   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00116   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00117   return ( distance >= 2 * c1->radius * sin (c1->mu)); 
00118 }   
00119     
00120 bool TST_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00121   return TiST_exists (c1, c2) || TeST_exists (c1, c2);
00122 }    
00123      
00124 double TiST_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00125                   SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00126   // distance des centres
00127   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00128   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00129   double angle = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00130   // angle entre la droite des centres et la direction de la mu-tangente
00131   double alpha = fabs (asin (2 * c1->radius * cos (c1->mu) / distance));
00132   // parametres de position des configurations intermediaires dans le repere
00133   // local au centre de c1
00134   double delta_x = fabs (c1->radius * sin (c1->mu));
00135   double delta_y = fabs (c1->radius * cos (c1->mu));
00136   //
00137   double x, y, theta;
00138   if ( c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00139     theta = angle + alpha;
00140     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00141     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00142     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00143     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00144   }
00145   if ( c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00146     theta = angle - alpha;
00147     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00148     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00149     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00150     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00151   }
00152   if ( !c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00153     theta = angle - alpha;
00154     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00155     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00156     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00157     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00158   }
00159   if ( !c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00160     theta = angle + alpha;
00161     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00162     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00163     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00164     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00165   }
00166 
00167   // calcul de la longueur du chemin
00168   return rs_turn_length (c1, *q1) 
00169     + configuration_distance (**q1, **q2) 
00170     + rs_turn_length (c2, *q2);
00171 }   
00172     
00173 double TeST_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00174                   SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00175   // parametres de position des configurations intermediaires dans le
00176   // repere local au centre de c1
00177   double delta_x = fabs (c1->radius * sin (c1->mu));
00178   double delta_y = fabs (c1->radius * cos (c1->mu));
00179   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00180   double theta = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00181   //
00182   double x, y;
00183   // calcul et creation des configurations intermediaires
00184   if ( c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00185     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00186     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00187     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00188     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00189   }
00190   if ( c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00191     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00192     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00193     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00194     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00195   }
00196   if ( !c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00197     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00198     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00199     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00200     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00201   }
00202   if ( !c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00203     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00204     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00205     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00206     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00207   }
00208   // calcul de la longueur du chemin
00209   return rs_turn_length (c1, *q1) 
00210     + configuration_distance (**q1, **q2) 
00211     + rs_turn_length (c2, *q2);
00212 }   
00213 
00214 double TST_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00215                  SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00216   if ( TiST_exists (c1, c2) ) { return TiST_path (c1, c2, q1, q2); }
00217   if ( TeST_exists (c1, c2) ) { return TeST_path (c1, c2, q1, q2); }
00218   return FLT_MAX;               // pour eviter un warning a la compilation
00219 }

00245 double TciST_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00246                    SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00247   // distance des centres
00248   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00249   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00250   double angle = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00251   // angle entre la droite des centres et la direction de la mu-tangente
00252   double alpha = fabs (asin (2 * c1->radius * cos (c1->mu) / distance));
00253   // parametres de position des configurations intermediaires dans le repere
00254   // local au centre de c1
00255   double delta_x = fabs (c1->radius * sin (c1->mu));
00256   double delta_y = fabs (c1->radius * cos (c1->mu));
00257   //
00258   double x, y, theta;
00259   if ( c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00260     theta = angle - alpha;
00261     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00262     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00263     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00264     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00265   }
00266   if ( c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00267     theta = angle + alpha;
00268     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00269     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00270     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00271     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00272   }
00273   if ( !c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00274     theta = angle + alpha;
00275     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00276     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00277     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00278     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00279   }
00280   if ( !c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00281     theta = angle - alpha;
00282     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00283     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00284     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00285     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00286   }
00287 
00288   // calcul de la longueur du chemin
00289   return rs_turn_length (c1, *q1) 
00290     + configuration_distance (**q1, **q2) 
00291     + rs_turn_length (c2, *q2);
00292 }

00305   if ( c1->left && c1->forward ) {

00307     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);

00344 bool TiScT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {

00348   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?

00366 double TiScT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00367                    SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00368   // distance des centres
00369   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00370   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00371   double angle = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00372   // angle entre la droite des centres et la direction de la mu-tangente
00373   double alpha = fabs (asin (2 * c1->radius * cos (c1->mu) / distance));
00374   // parametres de position des configurations intermediaires dans le repere
00375   // local au centre de c1
00376   double delta_x = fabs (c1->radius * sin (c1->mu));
00377   double delta_y = fabs (c1->radius * cos (c1->mu));
00378   //
00379   double x, y, theta;
00380   if ( c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00381     theta = angle + alpha;
00382     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00383     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00384     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00385     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00386   }
00387   if ( c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00388     theta = angle - alpha;
00389     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00390     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00391     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00392     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00393   }
00394   if ( !c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00395     theta = angle - alpha;
00396     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00397     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00398     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00399     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00400   }
00401   if ( !c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00402     theta = angle + alpha;
00403     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00404     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00405     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00406     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00407   }
00408 
00409   // calcul de la longueur du chemin
00410   return rs_turn_length (c1, *q1) 
00411     + configuration_distance (**q1, **q2) 
00412     + rs_turn_length (c2, *q2);
00413 }   
00414     
00415 double TeScT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00416                   SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00417   // parametres de position des configurations intermediaires dans le
00418   // repere local au centre de c1
00419   double delta_x = fabs (c1->radius * sin (c1->mu));
00420   double delta_y = fabs (c1->radius * cos (c1->mu));
00421   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00422   double theta = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00423   //
00424   double x, y;
00425   // calcul et creation des configurations intermediaires
00426   if ( c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00427     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00428     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00429     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00430     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00431   }
00432   if ( c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00433     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00434     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00435     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00436     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00437   }
00438   if ( !c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00439     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00440     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00441     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00442     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00443   }
00444   if ( !c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00445     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00446     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00447     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00448     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00449   }
00450   // calcul de la longueur du chemin
00451   return rs_turn_length (c1, *q1) 
00452     + configuration_distance (**q1, **q2) 
00453     + rs_turn_length (c2, *q2);
00454 }   
00455 
00456 double TScT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00457                  SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00458   if ( TiScT_exists (c1, c2) ) { return TiScT_path (c1, c2, q1, q2); }
00459   if ( TeScT_exists (c1, c2) ) { return TeScT_path (c1, c2, q1, q2); }
00460   return FLT_MAX;               // pour eviter un warning a la compilation
00461 }

00463 
00464 // ##### TcScT ################################################################
00465 bool TciScT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00466   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00467   if ( c1->left == c2->left ) { return false; }
00468   if ( c1->forward == c2->forward ) { return false; }
00469   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00470   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00471   return distance >= 2 * c1->radius * cos (c1->mu); 
00472 }
00473     
00474 bool TceScT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00475   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00476   if ( c1->left != c2->left ) { return false; }
00477   if ( c1->forward == c2->forward ) { return false; }
00478   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00479   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00480   return distance >= get_epsilon (); 
00481 }   
00482     
00483 bool TcScT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00484   return TciScT_exists (c1, c2) || TceScT_exists (c1, c2);
00485 }    
00486      
00487 double TciScT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00488                    SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00489   // distance des centres
00490   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00491   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00492   double angle = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00493   // angle entre la droite des centres et la direction de la mu-tangente
00494   double alpha = fabs (asin (2 * c1->radius * cos (c1->mu) / distance));
00495   // parametres de position des configurations intermediaires dans le repere
00496   // local au centre de c1
00497   double delta_x = fabs (c1->radius * sin (c1->mu));
00498   double delta_y = fabs (c1->radius * cos (c1->mu));
00499   //
00500   double x, y, theta;
00501   if ( c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00502     theta = angle - alpha;
00503     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00504     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00505     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00506     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00507   }
00508   if ( c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00509     theta = angle + alpha;
00510     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00511     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00512     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00513     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00514   }
00515   if ( !c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00516     theta = angle + alpha;
00517     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00518     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00519     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00520     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00521   }
00522   if ( !c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00523     theta = angle - alpha;
00524     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00525     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00526     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00527     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00528   }
00529 
00530   // calcul de la longueur du chemin
00531   return rs_turn_length (c1, *q1) 
00532     + configuration_distance (**q1, **q2) 
00533     + rs_turn_length (c2, *q2);
00534 }   
00535     
00536 double TceScT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00537                     SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00538   // parametres de position des configurations intermediaires dans le
00539   // repere local au centre de c1
00540   double delta_x = fabs (c1->radius * sin (c1->mu));
00541   double delta_y = fabs (c1->radius * cos (c1->mu));
00542   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00543   double theta = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00544   //
00545   double x, y;
00546   // calcul et creation des configurations intermediaires
00547   if ( c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00548     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00549     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00550     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00551     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00552   }
00553   if ( c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00554     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00555     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00556     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00557     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00558   }
00559   if ( !c1->left && c1->forward ) {
00560     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00561     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00562     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00563     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + Pi, 0);
00564   }
00565   if ( !c1->left && !c1->forward ) {
00566     global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00567     *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00568     global_frame_change (c2->xc, c2->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00569     *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00570   }
00571   // calcul de la longueur du chemin
00572   return rs_turn_length (c1, *q1) 
00573     + configuration_distance (**q1, **q2) 
00574     + rs_turn_length (c2, *q2);
00575 }   
00576 
00577 double TcScT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00578                    SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00579   if ( TciScT_exists (c1, c2) ) { return TciScT_path (c1, c2, q1, q2); }
00580   if ( TceScT_exists (c1, c2) ) { return TceScT_path (c1, c2, q1, q2); }
00581   return FLT_MAX;               // pour eviter un warning a la compilation
00582 }   
00583 
00584 
00585 // ##### TTT ##################################################################
00586 void TTT_tangent_circles (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00587                           SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2,
00588                           SMT_Configuration **q3, SMT_Configuration **q4) {
00589   // distance des centres
00590   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00591   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00592   double theta = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00593   // parametres de position des centres des cc-circles tangents dans le
00594   // repere local au centre de c1
00595   double r = 2 * c1->radius;
00596   double delta_x = 0.5 * distance;
00597   double delta_y = sqrt (fabs (pow (delta_x, 2) - pow (r, 2)));
00598 
00599   // creation des cc-circles tangents
00600   double x, y;
00601   global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00602   SMT_CC_Circle tgt1 (x, y, c1->radius, !c1->left, c1->forward,
00603                       c1->kappa, c1->sigma, c1->mu);
00604   global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00605   SMT_CC_Circle tgt2 (x, y, c1->radius, !c1->left, c1->forward,
00606                       c1->kappa, c1->sigma, c1->mu);
00607   // calcul des configurations intermediaires
00608   TT_path (c1, &tgt1, q1);
00609   TT_path (&tgt1, c2, q2);
00610   TT_path (c1, &tgt2, q3);
00611   TT_path (&tgt2, c2, q4);
00612 }
00613 
00614 bool TTT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00615   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00616   if ( c1->left != c2->left ) { return false; }
00617   if ( c1->forward == c2->forward ) { return false; }
00618   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00619   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00620   return distance <= 4 * c1->radius;   
00621 }
00622      
00623 double TTT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00624                  SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2,
00625                  SMT_CC_Circle **ci) {
00626   // 
00627   SMT_Configuration *qa, *qb, *qc, *qd;
00628   TTT_tangent_circles (c1, c2, &qa, &qb, &qc, &qd);
00629   //
00630   SMT_CC_Circle *middle1, *middle2;
00631   middle1 = new SMT_CC_Circle (*qa, !c1->left, c1->forward, 
00632                                c1->kappa, c1->sigma);
00633   double length1 = rs_turn_length (c1, qa) 
00634     + rs_turn_length (middle1, qb) 
00635     + rs_turn_length (c2, qb);
00636   middle2 = new SMT_CC_Circle (*qc, !c1->left, c1->forward, 
00637                                c1->kappa, c1->sigma);
00638   double length2 = rs_turn_length (c1, qc) 
00639     + rs_turn_length (middle2, qd) 
00640     + rs_turn_length (c2, qd);
00641   if ( length1 < length2 ) {
00642     *q1 = qa; *q2 = qb; *ci = middle1; 
00643     delete qc; delete qd; delete middle2; 
00644     return length1;
00645   }
00646   else {
00647     *q1 = qc; *q2 = qd; *ci = middle2; 
00648     delete qa; delete qb; delete middle1; 
00649     return length2;
00650   }
00651   return FLT_MAX;               // pour eviter un warning a la compilation
00652 }
00653 
00654 
00655 // ##### TcTT #################################################################
00656 void TcTT_tangent_circles (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00657                            SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2,
00658                            SMT_Configuration **q3, SMT_Configuration **q4) {
00659   // distance des centres
00660   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00661   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00662   double theta = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00663   // parametres de position des centres des cc-circles tangents dans le
00664   // repere local au centre de c1
00665   double r1 = 2 * c1->radius * cos (c1->mu);
00666   double r2 = 2 * c1->radius;
00667   double delta_x = (pow (r1, 2) + pow (distance, 2) - pow (r2, 2)) 
00668     / (2 * distance);
00669   double delta_y = sqrt (fabs (pow (r1, 2) - pow (delta_x, 2)));
00670 
00671   // creation des cc-circles tangents
00672   double x, y;
00673   global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00674   SMT_CC_Circle tgt1 (x, y, c1->radius, !c1->left, !c1->forward,
00675                       c1->kappa, c1->sigma, c1->mu);
00676   global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00677   SMT_CC_Circle tgt2 (x, y, c1->radius, !c1->left, !c1->forward,
00678                       c1->kappa, c1->sigma, c1->mu);
00679   // calcul des configurations intermediaires
00680   TcT_path (c1, &tgt1, q1);
00681   TT_path (&tgt1, c2, q2);
00682   TcT_path (c1, &tgt2, q3);
00683   TT_path (&tgt2, c2, q4);
00684 }
00685 
00686 bool TcTT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00687   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00688   if ( c1->left != c2->left ) { return false; }
00689   if ( c1->forward != c2->forward ) { return false; }
00690   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00691   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00692   return distance <= 2 * c1->radius * (1 + cos (c1->mu));   
00693 }
00694      
00695 double TcTT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00696                   SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2,
00697                   SMT_CC_Circle **ci) {
00698   // 
00699   SMT_Configuration *qa, *qb, *qc, *qd;
00700   TcTT_tangent_circles (c1, c2, &qa, &qb, &qc, &qd);
00701   //
00702   SMT_CC_Circle *middle1, *middle2;
00703   middle1 = new SMT_CC_Circle (*qa, !c1->left, !c1->forward, 
00704                                c1->kappa, c1->sigma);
00705   double length1 = rs_turn_length (c1, qa) 
00706     + rs_turn_length (middle1, qb) 
00707     + rs_turn_length (c2, qb);
00708   middle2 = new SMT_CC_Circle (*qc, !c1->left, !c1->forward, 
00709                                c1->kappa, c1->sigma);
00710   double length2 = rs_turn_length (c1, qc) 
00711     + rs_turn_length (middle2, qd) 
00712     + rs_turn_length (c2, qd);
00713   if ( length1 < length2 ) {
00714     *q1 = qa; *q2 = qb; *ci = middle1; 
00715     delete qc; delete qd; delete middle2;
00716     return length1;
00717   }
00718   else {
00719     *q1 = qc; *q2 = qd; *ci = middle2; 
00720     delete qa; delete qb; delete middle1; 
00721     return length2;
00722   }
00723   return FLT_MAX;               // pour eviter un warning a la compilation
00724 }

00735   // parametres de position des centres des cc-circles tangents dans le

00738   double r2 = 2 * c1->radius * cos (c1->mu);
00739   double delta_x = (pow (r1, 2) + pow (distance, 2) - pow (r2, 2)) 
00740     / (2 * distance);

00750                       c1->kappa, c1->sigma, c1->mu);
00751   // calcul des configurations intermediaires

00755   TcT_path (&tgt2, c2, q4);
00756 }

00798 
00799 // ##### TcTcT ################################################################
00800 void TcTcT_tangent_circles (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00801                             SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2,
00802                             SMT_Configuration **q3, SMT_Configuration **q4) {
00803   // distance des centres
00804   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00805   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00806   double theta = atan2 (c2->yc - c1->yc, c2->xc - c1->xc);
00807   // parametres de position des centres des cc-circles tangents dans le
00808   // repere local au centre de c1
00809   double r = 2 * c1->radius * cos (c1->mu);
00810   double delta_x = 0.5 * distance;
00811   double delta_y = sqrt (fabs (pow (r, 2) - pow (delta_x, 2)));
00812 
00813   // creation des cc-circles tangents
00814   double x, y;
00815   global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00816   SMT_CC_Circle tgt1 (x, y, c1->radius, !c1->left, !c1->forward,
00817                       c1->kappa, c1->sigma, c1->mu);
00818   global_frame_change (c1->xc, c1->yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00819   SMT_CC_Circle tgt2 (x, y, c1->radius, !c1->left, !c1->forward,
00820                       c1->kappa, c1->sigma, c1->mu);
00821   // calcul des configurations intermediaires
00822   TcT_path (c1, &tgt1, q1);
00823   TcT_path (&tgt1, c2, q2);
00824   TcT_path (c1, &tgt2, q3);
00825   TcT_path (&tgt2, c2, q4);
00826 }
00827 
00828 bool TcTcT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00829   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00830   if ( c1->left != c2->left ) { return false; }
00831   if ( c1->forward == c2->forward ) { return false; }
00832   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00833   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00834   return distance <= 4 * c1->radius * cos (c1->mu);   
00835 }
00836      
00837 double TcTcT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00838                    SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2,
00839                    SMT_CC_Circle **ci) {
00840   // 
00841   SMT_Configuration *qa, *qb, *qc, *qd;
00842   TcTcT_tangent_circles (c1, c2, &qa, &qb, &qc, &qd);
00843   //
00844   SMT_CC_Circle *middle1, *middle2;
00845   middle1 = new SMT_CC_Circle (*qa, !c1->left, !c1->forward, 
00846                                c1->kappa, c1->sigma);
00847   double length1 = rs_turn_length (c1, qa) 
00848     + rs_turn_length (middle1, qb) 
00849     + rs_turn_length (c2, qb);
00850   middle2 = new SMT_CC_Circle (*qc, !c1->left, !c1->forward, 
00851                                c1->kappa, c1->sigma);
00852   double length2 = rs_turn_length (c1, qc) 
00853     + rs_turn_length (middle2, qd) 
00854     + rs_turn_length (c2, qd);
00855   if ( length1 < length2 ) {
00856     *q1 = qa; *q2 = qb; *ci = middle1; 
00857     delete qc; delete qd; delete middle2; 
00858     return length1;
00859   }
00860   else {
00861     *q1 = qc; *q2 = qd; *ci = middle2; 
00862     delete qa; delete qb; delete middle1; 
00863     return length2;
00864   }
00865   return FLT_MAX;               // pour eviter un warning a la compilation
00866 }
00867

00897 // ##### TTSTT ################################################################
00898 bool TTiSTT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00899   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00900   if ( c1->left == c2->left ) { return false; }
00901   if ( c1->forward == c2->forward ) { return false; }
00902   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00903   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00904   if ( fabs (distance - 6 * c1->radius) > get_epsilon () ) { return false; }
00905   return true;
00906 }
00907 
00908 bool TTeSTT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00909   // les cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00910   if ( c1->left != c2->left ) { return false; }
00911   if ( c1->forward == c2->forward ) { return false; }
00912   // les centres sont-ils a la bonne distance ?
00913   double distance = point_distance (c1->xc, c1->yc, c2->xc, c2->yc);
00914   if ( fabs (distance - 2 * c1->radius * (2 + sin (c1->mu))) 
00915        > get_epsilon () ) 
00916     { return false; }
00917   return true;
00918 }
00919 
00920 bool TTSTT_exists (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2) {
00921   return TTiSTT_exists (c1, c2) || TTeSTT_exists (c1, c2);
00922 }
00923 
00924 double TTSTT_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00925                    SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2,
00926                    SMT_Configuration **q3, SMT_Configuration **q4,
00927                    SMT_CC_Circle **ci1, SMT_CC_Circle **ci2) {
00928   return FLT_MAX;               // pour eviter un warning a la compilation
00929 }

00931 // ############################################################################
00932 SMT_CC_RS_Path *cc_circles_rs_path (SMT_CC_Circle *c1, SMT_CC_Circle *c2,
00933                                     double kappa, double sigma) {
00934   // tableaux destines a stocker les longueurs des chemins possibles, les
00935   // configurations intermediaires et les cc-circles correspondants
00936   double length [nb_cc_rs_paths];
00937   double_array_init (length, nb_cc_rs_paths, FLT_MAX);
00938   SMT_Configuration *qi1 [nb_cc_rs_paths];
00939   pointer_array_init ((void **) qi1, nb_cc_rs_paths);
00940   SMT_Configuration *qi2 [nb_cc_rs_paths];
00941   pointer_array_init ((void **) qi2, nb_cc_rs_paths);
00942   SMT_Configuration *qi3 [nb_cc_rs_paths];
00943   pointer_array_init ((void **) qi3, nb_cc_rs_paths);
00944   SMT_Configuration *qi4 [nb_cc_rs_paths];
00945   pointer_array_init ((void **) qi4, nb_cc_rs_paths);
00946   SMT_CC_Circle *cstart [nb_cc_rs_paths];
00947   pointer_array_init ((void **) cstart, nb_cc_rs_paths);
00948   SMT_CC_Circle *ci1 [nb_cc_rs_paths];
00949   pointer_array_init ((void **) ci1, nb_cc_rs_paths);
00950   SMT_CC_Circle *ci2 [nb_cc_rs_paths];
00951   pointer_array_init ((void **) ci2, nb_cc_rs_paths);
00952   SMT_CC_Circle *cend [nb_cc_rs_paths];
00953   pointer_array_init ((void **) cend, nb_cc_rs_paths);
00954 
00955   // traitement des differents cas possibles
00956   // d'abord les cas particuliers
00957   // cas Empty
00958   if ( configuration_equal (c1->start, c2->start) ) {
00959     length [Empty] = 0;
00960     goto label_fin;
00961   }
00962   // cas Segment+
00963   if (configuration_aligned (c1->start, c2->start) ) {
00964     length [Segment] = configuration_distance (c1->start, c2->start);
00965     goto label_fin;
00966   }
00967   // cas Segment-
00968   if (configuration_aligned (c2->start, c1->start) ) {
00969     length [Segment] = configuration_distance (c2->start, c1->start);
00970     goto label_fin;
00971   }
00972   // cas T
00973   if ( configuration_on_cc_circle (*c1, c2->start) ) {
00974     cstart [T] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
00975     length [T] = rs_turn_length (c1, &(c2->start));
00976     goto label_fin;
00977   }
00978 
00979   // puis les autres
00980   // cas TT
00981   // ######
00982   if ( TT_exists (c1, c2) ) { 
00983     cstart [TT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
00984     cend [TT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c2);
00985     length [TT] = TT_path (c1, c2, &qi1 [TT]);
00986   }
00987   // cas TcT
00988   // #######
00989   if ( TcT_exists (c1, c2) ) {
00990     cstart [TcT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
00991     cend [TcT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c2);
00992     length [TcT] = TcT_path (c1, c2, &qi1 [TcT]);
00993   }
00994 
00995   // cas TST
00996   // #######
00997   if ( TST_exists (c1, c2) ) {
00998     cstart [TST] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
00999     cend [TST] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c2);
01000     length [TST] = TST_path (c1, c2, &qi1 [TST], &qi2 [TST]);
01001   }
01002   // cas TcST
01003   // ########
01004   if ( TcST_exists (c1, c2) ) {
01005     cstart [TcST] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
01006     cend [TcST] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c2);
01007     length [TcST] = TcST_path (c1, c2, &qi1 [TcST], &qi2 [TcST]);
01008   }
01009   // cas TScT
01010   // ########
01011   if ( TScT_exists (c1, c2) ) {
01012     cstart [TScT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
01013     cend [TScT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c2);
01014     length [TScT] = TScT_path (c1, c2, &qi1 [TScT], &qi2 [TScT]);
01015   }
01016   // cas TcScT
01017   // #########
01018   if ( TcScT_exists (c1, c2) ) {
01019     cstart [TcScT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
01020     cend [TcScT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c2);
01021     length [TcScT] = TcScT_path (c1, c2, &qi1 [TcScT], &qi2 [TcScT]);
01022   }
01023 
01024   // cas TTT
01025   // #######
01026   if ( TTT_exists (c1, c2) ) {
01027     cstart [TTT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
01028     cend [TTT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c2);
01029     length [TTT] = TTT_path (c1, c2, &qi1 [TTT], &qi2 [TTT], &ci1 [TTT]);
01030   }
01031   // cas TcTT
01032   // ########
01033   if ( TcTT_exists (c1, c2) ) {
01034     cstart [TcTT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
01035     cend [TcTT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c2);
01036     length [TcTT] = TcTT_path (c1, c2, &qi1 [TcTT], &qi2 [TcTT], &ci1 [TcTT]);
01037   }
01038   // cas TTcT
01039   // ########
01040   if ( TTcT_exists (c1, c2) ) {
01041     cstart [TTcT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
01042     cend [TTcT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c2);
01043     length [TTcT] = TTcT_path (c1, c2, &qi1 [TTcT], &qi2 [TTcT], &ci1 [TTcT]);
01044   }
01045   // cas TcTcT
01046   // #########
01047   if ( TcTcT_exists (c1, c2) ) {
01048     cstart [TcTcT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c1);
01049     cend [TcTcT] = new SMT_CC_Circle (*c2);
01050     length [TcTcT] = TcTcT_path (c1, c2, &qi1 [TcTcT], 
01051                                  &qi2 [TcTcT], &ci1 [TcTcT]);
01052   }
01053 
01054  label_fin:  
01055   // determination du plus court chemin
01056   cc_rs_path_type best_path = (cc_rs_path_type) 
01057     array_index_min (length, nb_cc_rs_paths);
01058 
01059   // contruction du plus court chemin
01060   SMT_CC_RS_Path *path;
01061   path = new SMT_CC_RS_Path (c1->start, c2->start,
01062                              best_path, kappa, sigma,
01063                              qi1 [best_path], qi2 [best_path],
01064                              qi3 [best_path], qi4 [best_path],
01065                              cstart [best_path], cend [best_path],
01066                              ci1 [best_path], ci2 [best_path],
01067                              length [best_path], 0);
01068 
01069   // menage
01070   for (int i = 0; i < nb_cc_rs_paths; i++) {
01071     if ( i != best_path ) {
01072       delete qi1 [i]; delete qi2 [i]; delete qi3 [i]; delete qi4 [i];
01073       delete cstart [i]; delete ci1 [i]; delete ci2 [i]; delete cend [i];
01074     }
01075   }
01076 
01077   //retour du plus court chemin
01078   return path;
01079 }
01080 
01081 // ############################################################################
01082 SMT_CC_RS_Path *cc_reeds_shepp (SMT_Configuration start, 
01083                                 SMT_Configuration end,
01084                                 double kappa, double sigma) {
01085   // on lance le chronometre
01086   start_chronometer ();
01087 
01088   // calcul des cc_circles associes aux configurations start et end
01089   SMT_CC_Circle *start_circle [4];
01090   SMT_CC_Circle *end_circle [4];
01091   
01092   start_circle [0] = new SMT_CC_Circle (start, true, true, kappa, sigma);
01093   start_circle [1] = new SMT_CC_Circle (start, false, true, kappa, sigma);
01094   start_circle [2] = new SMT_CC_Circle (start, true, false, kappa, sigma);
01095   start_circle [3] = new SMT_CC_Circle (start, false, false, kappa, sigma);
01096   end_circle [0] = new SMT_CC_Circle (end, true, true, kappa, sigma);
01097   end_circle [1] = new SMT_CC_Circle (end, false, true, kappa, sigma);
01098   end_circle [2] = new SMT_CC_Circle (end, true, false, kappa, sigma);
01099   end_circle [3] = new SMT_CC_Circle (end, false, false, kappa, sigma);
01100 
01101   // calcul du cc-rs-path pour les 16 combinaisons possibles de cc-circles
01102   // de debut et de fin
01103   SMT_CC_RS_Path *path [] = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 
01104                              0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
01105   double lg [] = {FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX,
01106                   FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX,
01107                   FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX,
01108                   FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX};
01109     
01110   for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) { // index des cc-circles de depart
01111     for (int j = 0; j < 4; j++) { // index des cc-circles d'arrivee
01112       path [4*i + j] = cc_circles_rs_path (start_circle [i], end_circle [j],
01113                                            kappa, sigma);
01114       if ( !null (path [4*i + j]) ) {lg [4*i + j] = 
01115                                        path [4*i + j]->length; }
01116     }
01117   }
01118 
01119   // determination du plus court chemin
01120   int best_path = array_index_min (lg, 15);
01121   
01122   // mesure du temps ecoule
01123   double time = look_at_chronometer ();
01124   path [best_path]->time = time;
01125 
01126   // trace des calculs
01127 //    cout << "*** CC_Reeds_Shepp" << endl;
01128 //    for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
01129 //      cout << i << ": "; 
01130 //      if ( !null (path [i]) ) { path [i]->print (true); }
01131 //    }  
01132 //    cout << "plus court chemin: " << (int) best_path << endl;
01133 
01134   // menage
01135   for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) { 
01136     delete start_circle [i]; delete end_circle [i];
01137   }
01138   for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++) { 
01139     if ( i != best_path) { delete path [i]; }
01140   }
01141 
01142   //retour du plus court chemin
01143   return path [best_path];
01144 }
